Text: Thank you for the reup. Though I must ask again is this a scanlation or an actual english translated version?
^ this is,as said in the uploader comments,taken from the spectrum nexus site,which in turn has the scanned versions of the licensed tokyopop volumes

Ahlat,

I am not entirely sure. The website says that all of their mangas are scanlations. But, the entry for GTO says that they are in the process of scanning the volumes. So, I'm thinking these scans are from the actual Tokyopop volumes.
